description: Opensource Python library for scraping tweets (by user, by hashtag, by keyword). NO LOGIN OR API KEY REQUIRED.
A very simple tool that allows you to select a geolocation/radius and get a list of recent tweets made in that place.
A simple and fast Chrome extension that finds all Twitter accounts on a site.
This service allows you to find out how many followers two (or three) Twitter accounts have in common.
Displayed unsubscribed accounts (list for the one week available for free).
Best tool for Twitter account investigation.
A free online tool for analysing your Twitter account: - shows the mutual following; - search for tweets by calendar; - list of most active readers; - analysis of daily activity, hashtags and more.
View dialogs in Twitter as a graph.
Compare the popularity of the two hashtags.
Search twitter lists by keywords.
Real-time visualization of tweets on a world map.
Detailed twitter account analyze.
Tweet Sentiment Visualization.
Analyze friends and followers on Twitter.
Explore topics in tweets.
Estimate earnings from Twitter.
Gather detailed information about your own account.
Twitter sidebar with: quick commands for searching your own tweets, lists, users tweets and replies; quick links to quotes of current tweet, user's most liked tweets and conversations.
Very fast export of information about Twitter account followers to XLSX.
Check if your account has been shadow-banned.
A world map that shows the locations of users who mention you in their tweets.
A simple tool for analyzing twitter conversations (and other pages). Get profile pictures, user names and the text of the conversation's tweets and replies. Data can be exported to CSV, JSON, XML.
Quick check if one user is subscribed to another on Twitter.
Determining the approximate sleeping time of a user based on analysis of the timing of a tweet.
Tool for quick and comfortable viewing old tweet's of someone account.
Twitter users directory.
In-depth analysis of Twitter followers. Identifies inactive and fake accounts, assesses followers by the number of tweets, profile information (biography, geolocation, links, profile picture).
Twitter account detailed analyze.
Get day Twitter Trends.
US Twitter Trend Calendar.
Search by Twitter bio.
Twitter Botometer.
Copy a list made by another user to your Twitter account.
iOS App that tracking unfollowers and show nofollowersback and unactive followers for your Twitter account.
Very simple, quick, comfortable and nicely designed advanced Twitter search query builder for GoogleChrome.
Scrape any Twitter user profile. Creates an unofficial Twitter API to extract tweets, retweets, replies, favorites, and conversation threads with no Twitter API limits.

A wide range of options for analyzing Twitter trending history: 1. See what was popular on a particular day in a particular country or in the world as a whole. 2. Enter a keyword and find out when it was in the global/particular country trends.
Twitter conversation visualization (beta).
Trending Twitter users and hashtags (map/list) Top twitted cities and countries Realtime Tweet Map.

A tool for finding and filtering your own Twitter followers. It allows you to find all the people from a certain city or with certain interests. And then quickly view their profiles in a convenient format.
A tool for analyzing connections between Twitter accounts (based on the number of likes, retweets, tweet citations, and mentions).
Full archives of tweets in JSON for a particular month (from 2011, but some months are not available).
3D viewer of relationships between twitter users.
(PAID) Download followers & followings, export historical tweets since 2016.
Browser extension that shows who really is a verified Twitter user and who paid $8 for verification.

In case your Twitter account is blocked, it's usefull to open settings and download account data. This tool extracts the most important info about tweets from archive and formats it in an easy-to-read way.
In recent weeks, I have been seeing more and more accounts deleting their tweets in whole or in part. You can automate this process with this tool.
A very easy-to-use Python library that allows you to collect all of a user's tweets into a CSV/JSON file. Also it's possible to collect tweets by hashtag or geolocation.

New Twitter search tool using OpenAI GPT 3.5. Type queries in simple english language to get lists of tweets or users. For example: most liked tweets abou people followed by Jeff Bezos who don't follow him back total number of users/tweet.
Twitter Spaces download service (available after the broadcast ends). Works for quite a long time. It took about 5 minutes to generate an MP3 file with an audio recording of the 46-minute space.

A cross-browser extension that allows you to have maximum control over your Twitter feed: Hide retweets, quote tweets, who to follow etc; Reduce "engagement"; Hide UI items; Remove algoritmic content.
A tool to quickly view tweets saved on http://archive.org No need to open a link to each tweet in a separate window It's possible to filter only deleted tweets.
